means: 卢瓦尔河（法国中部）（或译罗亚尔河发源于塞文山脉，经中央高原，西流注入大西洋的比斯开湾，是法国最长的河流）

sentence.Network_en: His hotel is situated in one of the loveliest places on the Loire.
sentence.Network_cn: 他下榻的旅馆位于卢瓦河畔最漂亮的地方之一。

sentence.Network_en: There's something about the Loire Valley that makes you want to savour every moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢瓦尔山谷有某种特殊气息，让人想要充分享受在这里的每时每刻。

sentence.Network_en: One of the most scenic areas of central France is Loire Valley.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国中部最优美的地区是卢瓦尔河流域.
